t: Squatchi Children's Foot Sizer Review - Meet Penny
s: January 19, 2017 - Share & Help Me Grow My children all want slippers for Christmas. How exactly can I manage that? Gathering my small herd together and traipsing into a shoe store to get their feet sized one by one. Then, creating an excuse not to make the purchases in order to keep the gifts secret.
Squatchi is the same scale as the brannock kids foot sizer found in most shoe stores. I personally measure up for growth either a half size of whole size depending on the show and how it fits.
